summary: This is a U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General evidence custody document recording the seizure of Bureau of Prisons (BOP) Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) control center 30-day files from July and August 2019. The document is part of an investigation, likely related to events at the MCC, and includes chain of custody signatures.

persons.name: Alaclitti
persons.context: Signed as the seizing special agent on the evidence custody document for items seized from BOP MCC.

events.title: Seizure of BOP MCC Control Center Files
events.description: U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General seized Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center control center 30-day files covering dates from July 22, 2019, to August 14, 2019.

locations: BOP MCC (Bureau of Prisons Metropolitan Correctional Center)
keyFacts: Evidence custody document shows seizure of BOP MCC control center 30-day files from July and August 2019.
The seizure was conducted by the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General, indicating an official investigation into matters at the MCC.
The document records chain of custody for the seized items, with signatures from a seizing special agent named Alaclitti and a witness.
The file reference 'NYFO 2010-010614' suggests this is part of a broader case or investigation number.
